title: Amount spent on smartphone accessories by U.S. consumers 2010
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 3 different Responses for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up that are presented on the X-axis.
In Response Android owners, Under $50 had the highest SOME LABEL 60.0 among the 4 groups and in BlackBerry owners, $200 and up had the lowest SOME LABEL 1.0.
Among all the Responses, $200 and up had the highest SOME LABEL 9.0 in Response iPhone owners and lowest value 1.0 in Response BlackBerry owners.
Response iPhone owners and BlackBerry owners had the biggest gap of 8.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for $200 and up.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Responses on X-axis for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Response Android owners, Under $50 had the highest SOME LABEL 60.0 among the 4 groups and in BlackBerry owners, $200 and up had the lowest SOME LABEL 1.0.
Among all the Responses, $200 and up had the highest SOME LABEL in Response iPhone owners and lowest SOME LABEL in Response BlackBerry owners.
Response iPhone owners and BlackBerry owners had the biggest gap of 8.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for $200 and up.
Among the groups, Under $50 had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 1.82 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.

In Response Android owners, Under $50 had the highest SOME LABEL 60.0 among the 4 groups and in BlackBerry owners, $200 and up had the lowest SOME LABEL 1.0. The second highest SOME LABEL 19.0 was observed for Under $50 in Response Android owners.
On average, the Response BlackBerry owners had the highest SOME LABEL for all 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up. Whereas Android owners had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
